MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SK9 and WA16 postcode areas of Alderley Edge and Knutsford, affecting properties in Sandlebridge Rise, Mill Lane, Pinfold Lane and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:31PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a suspected faulty piece of equipment. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 8:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:29PM on 26th October 2020.
